Title: D.P.O.
Plot: Mulder and Scully investigate a series of human and cattle deaths by lightning and are led to a teenage boy who is the only survivor out of five people recently hit by lightning strikes.
GuestStars: Giovanni Ribisi, Jack Black, Ernie Lively, Karen Witter, Steve Makaj, Peter Anderson, Kate Robbins, Mar Anderson, Brent Chapman, Jason Anthony Griffith, Bonnie Hay, Cavan Cunningham, Aaron Poole
